page.title: 06Science and Technology E.K.
page.content: Part of{N.E.L.(National Engineering {Laboratory)}is in the North East of our square.N.E.L.is the main technology resource in East Kilbride.The company is made up of various buildings.Each building, or divisions as they are known, concentrates on a specific aspect of engineering research, trying to investigate ideas and improve them. They all play a major roll in tomorrow's technology.N.E.L's main concerns are offshore structures and operations, automation, process & machinery & robotics.Most of their high research skills are in demand by other companies.They also take on other kinds of problems like designing and testing.To shorten this,it's an all_purpose company.
